p: Patent application WO2013049382 discloses both structures and syntheses of compounds from various structure classes (peptidyl aldehydes, peptidyl Î±-ketoamides, peptidyl bisulfite salts, and peptidyl heterocycles), as well as certain formulation compositions, developed to inhibit viral 3C protease or 3C-like protease (i.e., 3CLpro).
